You should be thankful for your comfortable home. We often suffer with cold on account of unfinished and open houses. Last 
41
night we slept in a chamber where there was an opening through the top for the stove-pipe. If it had stormed it would have come direct in our faces. Pray for us. Unless the Lord opens the way for us to return, we may be blocked in with snow, and have to remain all winter.
